instructions:
In an 8 inch skillet fry bacon until crisp, crumble and set aside. Sauté onion and celery in 1 tbsp of bacon
drippings. Mix flour, sugar, dry mustard and salt. Combine water and vinegar and add to the flour-sugar
mixture. Stir until well mixed. Add this mixture to the sautéed onion and celery and cook gently until
thickened and bubbly. Add the sliced potatoes, shredded carrot and parsley to this sweet-sour sauce and
gently toss to coat. Heat to warm throughout. Sprinkle with crumbled bacon.
Serves 2. 
*(Rev. 2/19/94)*
ingredients: 3/4 lb potatoes, cooked and sliced (red if available)
name: German Potato Salad
creator: Taste of Home
